Zero: 'Just as soon as im repaired..."

Elsewhere the fot shots slam into the right head causing it to 
scrrech out in pain. A second later a freeze beam is sent out at 
Hotrod by the left head, the beam freexzes anything it touches 
whether it be a rock or something.(council knows about it and dont 
object), meanwhile the right head sends 2 explosive fireballs at 
Windlord.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Starstomp:
> Well, from what I see, he looks to be in better shape than you... 
Alright. 
> I'll leave you at the base, then I'll go get the other wounded 
chivtrons. 
> Will you help me to get them in CR?
> 
>

> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> >To: nbwrpg@y...
> >Subject: Re: The D.E.D are back./Shockwave talk...
> >Date: Tue, 17 Jul 2001 00:30:53 -0000
> >
> >Zero: "Im fine I can make it to the CR Chamber. Im not as bad off 
as
> >him."
> >
> >Zero Turns and points to where Methos WAS but is there no longer.
> >
> >Zero: "Damn it! He got away!"
> >
> >Zero clutches his stomach wound and chest wound again and continues
> >to fly towards the chivtrons base as sparks fly from his wounds.
> >
> >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nicolas Marion" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Starstomp:
> > > I'll be some slaggin shit if I let a comrade standing and dying.
> >I'm taking
> > > you to CR. And dont you say a word about it!
> > >

> >towards

> > > >

> > > >

> > > >
> > > >Gemini Dragon laughs as it looks to Windlord, both heads 
narrowing
> > > >their eyes.
> > > >
> > > >Gemini Dragon: "Eh heh heh heh... now you.. die!"
> > > >
> > > >With those words the right head fires off two highly explosive
> > > >fireballs as the second head fires off an ice beam, the tail
> >sending
> > > >an intense bolt of electricity at windlord.
> > > >

wrote:

butt,
